title: Report: Android Pay launching with LG Nexus in October | Trusted Reviews
description: ![androidpay]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * What’s more, Android M and, by association, Android Pay are also set for anautumn launch, which gels with the mooted October release window.It’s worth noting that Google is also reportedly working on a second Nexusdevice – the much-rumoured Huawei Nexus 6.**Related:[Best Android Smartphones 2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)**Nexus devices usually act as launch vehicles for new Android software, so it’slikely both of the new handsets will carry Android M.As such, Android Pay also looks set to appear, giving Google a formidablemobile payments service to rival the competing [ApplePay](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/what-is-apple-pay) and SamsungPay.Google has yet to confirm any of these details, so we’ll have to take thislatest report with a pinch of salt.Check out our smartphone group test video below:
